short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bulk-export posts from Facebook, works on profile pages, groups, and search results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
You might have posted lots of updates, photos, and videos on Facebook over the years. If youâ€™re ready to quit the social network, or just want to have all that content available elsewhere, you can export your posts to a different service.

This extension allows you to bulk-export all posts from ANYone timeline, any page and any group.

Unlike the tools provided by facebook, this extension allows you to export other people's data.

You can import the exported posts to other platforms, such as wordpress or blog, or you can use these posts for data analysis. 

JSON type files can be processed by any programming langs. If you are a developer, this is very useful for you.

post fields you can get in JSON file:
creation_time
post_id
url
comment_count
reaction_count
shared_count
author
-id
-gender
-name
-url
-avatar
post_title
post_type
message

long.ro:
Effortlessly export Facebook posts with this dynamic extension. Unlock the power to effortlessly bulk-export posts from any timeline, page, or group. This versatile tool supports multiple export formats such as JSON, HTML, and CSV, and even allows you to export directly to Google Sheets.

This extension allows you to bulk-export all posts from ANYone timeline, any page and any group.

Unlike the tools provided by facebook, this extension allows you to export other people's data.

You can import the exported posts to other platforms, such as wordpress or blog, or you can use these posts for data analysis. 

JSON type files can be processed by any programming langs. If you are a developer, this is very useful for you.
